mapper.insert: INSERT INTO team_tb (team_name, team_capacity, team_pic_url, team_introduce, level, region_id, sport_id) VALUES (#{teamName}, #{teamCapacity}, #{teamPicUrl}, #{teamIntroduce}, #{level}, #{regionId}, #{sportId})
mapper.select: select * from team_tb t Join region_tb r on t.region_id = r.id join sport_tb s on t.sport_id = s.id
